name: Tropical Moist Forests
coverage: Tropical and subtropical regions of the world, with emphasis on Latin America, Africa and Southeast Asia
source: Global map that identifies tropical moist forests and it's change over time, thanks to the analysis of satellite images with algorithms for detecting changes in forest cover. Developed by European Commission's Joint Research Centre.
updateFrequency: Generally updated every 1-2 years, depending on Landsat imagery availability
